summary: Male and female nude textures for the Fennec custom race, recompiled for compatibility with Schlongs Of Skyrim and Calientes Beautiful Bodies Edition.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#e06666][size=3][b]30/6/2017 I hereby give permission for other modders and content creators to use these tweaked textures as they see fit. They can give credit if they want, though 70% of what I did was just creative photoshopping so I wouldn't feel right demanding credit. Mods belong to the community as far as I'm concerned. I hadn't made such a statement regarding usage permissions until now because I thought it was implied, but better late than never, right? So yeah, use however.[/b][/size][/color]

--A NOTE--
The Fennec race mod appears to only be distributed as a packed .bsa now, so you need to unpack it to get at the files to replace. I'll see about making a .bsa replacer, but I've never done those before so you'll have to be patient.

Also I removed the Lover's Lab links. Apparently LL links are no bueno on Nexus, so you'll have to google those yourselves, sorry :/
--A NOTE--


Male and female nude textures for the Fennec custom race found [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62176/?]here[/url], recompiled for compatibility with Schlongs Of Skyrim and Calientes Beautiful Bodies Edition. I don't know how to do FOMOD packages yet, so for now you'll have to manually swap the files.

The male texture is at:
<skyrim install location>/data/textures/actors/character/foxmale/foxmalebody.dds
The female texture is at:
<skyrim install location>/data/textures/actors/character/foxfemale/femalebody.dds

Tested and compatible with:

-Schlongs of SkyrimÂ "normal" body (should be compatible with bodybuilder mesh, untested)
-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Calientes Beautiful Bodies Edition[/url] "slim" body (should be compatible with all, untested)
-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54044/?]HDT Breast & Butt Physics[/url]

Compatible and very highly recommended:

-BadDog's Compleat Khajiit
-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50637/?]XPMSE True Digitigrade Beast Race skeleton[/url]
-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58165/?]HDT Tails[/url] (if you use the XPMSE digitigrade skeleton above, you'll need a patched version, it's an annoying spine node issue that leaves tails hovering in the air. For convenience I included a patched .nif replacer for the standard fox tail.)

It should also be compatible with most other meshes and body replacers (such as UNP) so let me know if you find anything it [i]isn't[/i] compatible with and I'll see if I can update it to fix that.

[s]KNOWN INCOMPATIBILITIES:
"Furry Age Of Skyrim" player appears fine, but NPC Fennecs turn invisible. If anybody knows a workaround please let me know and I'll post it.
[/s]Fixed itself, cause still unknown.
author: TanyaSapien

files.name: HDT FoxTail XPMSE Digitigrade compatibility replacer
